statements: DELETE FROM SalaryInformation WHERE employee_id = 100 AND salary > 50000
DELETE FROM SalaryInformation WHERE benefits LIKE '%health%'
DELETE FROM Bonuses WHERE id = 100 AND bonus_amount >= 5000.00;
DELETE FROM SalaryInformation WHERE salary_amount < 3000.00 AND employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Benefits WHERE provider_name = 'HealthCorp' AND employee_id IN ('2001', '2002');
DELETE FROM BonusesData WHERE bonus_type = 'Performance' AND employee_id = 201;
DELETE FROM bonuses WHERE employee_id = 101 AND bonus_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM payroll_processing WHERE process_date < '2022-01-01' AND payment_status = 'pending';
